mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, userpw, username, email, gender) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select * from user where session_key = #{value} and session_limit > now()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (user_idx, weight, date) values(#{userIdx}, #{weight}, #{date}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE weight = VALUES(weight)
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(date, '%d') as date, weight from userinfo where user_idx = #{userIdx} AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = #{month} order by date
select Date(date) as date, weight from userinfo where user_idx = #{userIdx} order by date
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, userpw = #{userpw}, height = #{height}, goal_weight = #{goalWeight} WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx}
